results.title: Keratoconjunctivitis sicca exacerbation in a dog treated with systemic atenolol.
results.text_hl: After 2 months, @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D011666 @@@pulmonic stenosis@@@ was diagnosed, and the @SPECIES_9615 @@@dog@@@ commenced treatment with oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@; the @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@ophthalmological disease@@@ worsened dramatically within a few days.

citations.NLM: Barsotti G, Vezzosi T. Keratoconjunctivitis sicca exacerbation in a dog treated with systemic atenolol. J Small Anim Pract. 2016 Jul;57(7):379-81. PMID: 27071733
citations.BibTeX: @article{27071733, title={Keratoconjunctivitis sicca exacerbation in a dog treated with systemic atenolol.}, author={Barsotti G and Vezzosi T}, journal={J Small Anim Pract}, volume={57}, number={7}, pages={379-81}}

results.title: Preparation, in-vitro and in-vivo characterization of transdermal patch containing glibenclamide and atenolol: a combinational approach.
results.text_hl: A novel aspiration in treatment of chronic @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@disease@@@ like @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ associated with other non communicable @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@disease@@@ risk factors, such as @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ is to provide greater therapeutic effect, overcome the side effects by complex therapeutic regimen and to improve @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ compliance upon administering combinational transdermal delivery of @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@Glibenclamide@@@ (G) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (A) which have not been tested literally.

citations.NLM: Anitha P, Ramkanth S, Saleem MT, Umasankari K, Reddy BP, Chetty M. Preparation, in-vitro and in-vivo characterization of transdermal patch containing glibenclamide and atenolol: a combinational approach. Pak J Pharm Sci. 2011 Apr;24(2):155-63. PMID: 21454164
citations.BibTeX: @article{21454164, title={Preparation, in-vitro and in-vivo characterization of transdermal patch containing glibenclamide and atenolol: a combinational approach.}, author={Anitha P and Ramkanth S and Saleem MT and Umasankari K and Reddy BP and Chetty M}, journal={Pak J Pharm Sci}, volume={24}, number={2}, pages={155-63}}

results.title: Beta-adrenergic-blocking agents in bronchospastic diseases: a therapeutic dilemma.
results.text_hl: Beta-adrenergic-blocking agents in @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@bronchospastic diseases@@@: a therapeutic dilemma.
